程序包 View.Bill

类 BillPanel.ModernScrollBarUI

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
javax.swing.plaf.ScrollBarUI

View.Bill.BillPanel.ModernScrollBarUI
所有已实现的接口:
LayoutManager, SwingConstants
封闭类:
BillPanel
private static class BillPanel.ModernScrollBarUI extends BasicScrollBarUI
A custom UI for scrollbars with a modern look, featuring a rounded thumb and track.

  • 嵌套类概要
